text: Hey everyone, unfortunately one of my colleagues at PathFactory was recently diagnosed with a rare form of cancer. Murali is an amazing person and an incredibly smart marketer. I’ve learned so much from him. We started a Go Fund Me to raise a bit of money to ensure he and his family have what they need during his treatment and recovery. If you’re feeling generous and want to do a good deed to help a complete stranger, even $10, you can do so here: <https://www.gofundme.com/f/helping-a-martech-legend-murali-kandasamy>

attachments.title: Helping a MarTech legend - Murali Kandasamy, organized by Helen Baptist
attachments.text: Murali Kandasamy is well known in the B2B marketing ecosystem and is one of… Helen Baptist needs your support for Helping a MarTech legend - Murali Kandasamy
attachments.fallback: gofundme.com: Helping a MarTech legend - Murali Kandasamy, organized by Helen Baptist
